评论概述: The material is nice and soft and does look like the photo
评论详情: I do like this top, however, I do not understand why the hip and length of the garments are never listed. Not everyone has perfect measurements! I have a “pear” shaped figure in which most of my weight is carried in my hip and thigh area. Measurements are: bust~42”, waist~ 43”, and hips~ 51”, my height is 5’ 1/2”tall. So my biggest concern is the hip measurement as I do not like material hugging my hips. But none of the sellers that I checked would list the hip or length of their garments. Being short I don’t like my tops too long. I do like the beautiful colors in this top, but do wish it had maybe 2 to 3 inches more at the hip line as I don’t like things to cling. I.have been loosing weight so I will keep this top. But PLEASE in the future do include the hip and length measurements!
